DOC.brief_title: High v Standard Energy Children 's Drink Study
DOC.detailed_description: A four week , multi-centre , randomise control trial investigate effect high energy density , low volume oral nutritional supplement versus standard energy density oral nutritional supplement child age 1-12yrs old require nutritional support . Fifty eligible child recruit randomise receive either high energy density oral nutritional supplement standard energy density oral nutritional supplement four week . The primary outcome nutrient intake , secondary outcome compliance , tolerance , acceptability , anthropometry safety .
DOC.criteria: Male female Aged 112yrs Faltering growth and/or require oral nutritional supplement meet nutritional requirement Expected receive least one bottle study product per day Able take study product orally study period Written inform consent parent/carer Requirement 100 % nutrition via enteral tube and/or parenteral feeding . Children major hepatic renal dysfunction Children galactosaemia severe lactose intolerance Requirement elemental semielemental feed Investigator concern around willingness/ability child/parent/carer comply protocol requirement Participation study within 2 week study
